channel.title: nodejs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in nodejs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: node 解析html 文本
item.description: 获取h1标签 function TestPrintH1(){ const content = ` <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> </head> <body> <h1>hello dom html</h1> </body> </html> ` const $ = cheerio.load(content) const h1Html = $('h1').html() const expectH1Html = `hello dom html2` assert.equal(h1Html, expectH1Html) }
